Back 2 Back

Completed in two days by a team of five, Back 2 Back is an action, shooter game, where the player must control two characters facing back to back in order to kill/avoid all incoming enemies. Back 2 Back won first place in a University of Michigan Game Jam.

  • Play

Color Array

Completed in two weeks by a team of one, Color Array is a rapid prototype of an original puzzle platformer game with a simple color-changing mechanic.

  • Play

Legend of Zelda (Unity Remastered)

Completed in three weeks by a team of two, this Unity Remastered version of Legend of Zelda contains the first dungeon of the original NES game.

  • Play

About

3 months of experience using Unity.
